products.name: TideMaster Ninja 18
products.description: The TideMaster Ninja 18 is our flagship performance boat, designed for those who demand the ultimate in speed, handling, and technology. With its sleek, stealthy design and cutting-edge features, the Ninja 18 delivers an unmatched boating experience.
products.shortDescription: The ultimate performance boat with stealth design and cutting-edge technology.
features: Advanced deep-V hull design with 22Â° deadrise
Twin Mercury Verado outboard engines (up to 800 HP total)

products.name: TideMaster Hunter 28
products.description: The TideMaster Hunter 28 is a professional-grade fishing boat designed for serious anglers. Combining stability, storage, and cutting-edge fish-finding technology, the Hunter 28 is the ultimate platform for offshore fishing adventures.
products.shortDescription: Professional fishing boat with outstanding stability and storage space.
features: Twin outboard engines (up to 600 HP total)
Integrated fish boxes with macerator pumps
Rod storage for up to 20 rods
Spacious fishing deck with non-slip surface
Fresh and raw water washdown systems
Optional tower with second control station

products.name: TideMaster Cat 38
products.description: The TideMaster Cat 38 is a spacious, stable catamaran designed for family cruising, entertaining, and extended trips. With its generous living space, comfortable accommodations, and smooth ride, the Cat 38 offers the perfect balance of luxury and performance.
products.shortDescription: Spacious catamaran offering exceptional stability and comfort for family outings.
features: Twin hull catamaran design for maximum stability
Twin outboard engines (up to 700 HP total)
Spacious main cabin with panoramic windows
Full galley with refrigerator, stove, and sink
Large sun deck with comfortable seating

products.name: TideMaster Lounge 38
products.description: The TideMaster Lounge 38 is designed for the ultimate in on-water entertainment and relaxation. With expansive seating areas, premium entertainment features, and luxurious finishes, the Lounge 38 is the perfect vessel for day cruising and entertaining in style.
products.shortDescription: Luxury lounge boat designed for entertaining and comfort on the water.
features: Spacious open layout with seating for 15+
Twin outboard engines (up to 600 HP total)
Premium sound system with multiple zones
Full wet bar with refrigerator and ice maker
Luxurious lounge seating with premium upholstery

products.name: TideMaster Big Cat 60
products.description: The TideMaster Big Cat 60 is our premium flagship vessel, offering the ultimate in luxury, space, and performance. Designed for extended voyages and comfortable living aboard, the Big Cat 60 combines exceptional engineering with luxurious amenities.
products.shortDescription: Our flagship catamaran designed for extended voyages with all the comforts of home.
features: Massive twin hull design for maximum stability and space
Twin diesel inboard engines (up to 900 HP total)
Three private cabins with en-suite facilities
